name: marketplace

documentation.readme:
# soajs.marketplace

SOAJS repositories is a service that manages everything related to Catalogs.

### Complete Documentation
More information is available on SOAJS website under the section for [Marketplace](https://soajsorg.atlassian.net/wiki/x/AQD3Wg).

### License
*Copyright SOAJS All Rights Reserved.*

Use of this source code is governed by an Apache license that can be found in the LICENSE file at the root of this repository.
documentation.release:
# soajs release

SOAJS follows the fish names as release names

We also push patches per release that are numbered like Kanuy 4, Kanuy 5, â€¦

Each release or patch might affect several repositories and each source code has its own semantic version and each microservice has its own version.

### Complete Documentation
More information is available on SOAJS website under the section for [Release](https://soajsorg.atlassian.net/wiki/x/QYCmbw).

### License
*Copyright SOAJS All Rights Reserved.*

Use of this source code is governed by an Apache license that can be found in the LICENSE file at the root of this repository.

apis.l: This API lists the items matching certain keywords from soajs catalog only.
This API lists the public items matching certain keywords with option to select from what type and subtype.
This API lists the items matching certain keywords with option to select from what type and subtype.
This API lists the items matching certain type with option to select a subtype.
This API lists all items matching certain type with option to select a subtype including soajs items.
This API lists all item names matching certain types
This API lists all item names matching certain names
This API gets the items by source.
This API gets one item by its name and type.
This API gets the configure deployment of an item including (allowed recipes, saved configuration, and kubernetes configuration for both service and deployment|daemonset|cronjob)
List catalog recipes
List catalog recipes by selected ids
Get catalog recipe by id
Add new catalog
This API deletes an item
This API deletes items by source
This API deletes the configure deployment of an item
Delete a catalog recipe by id
This API updates the item environments from soajs catalog only
This API updates the item recipes from soajs catalog only
This API updates the item ACL from soajs catalog only
This API updates the item environments
This API updates the item recipes
This API updates the item ACL
This API adds/updates an item of type resource to the catalog
This API adds/updates an item of type service to the catalog
This API adds/updates an item of type daemon to the catalog
This API adds/updates an item of type static to the catalog
This API adds/updates an item of type custom to the catalog
This API adds/updates an item of type config to the catalog
This API appends the version configuration of an item.
This API adds/updates an item of type service built using the SOAJS Framework (config.js)
This API redeploys a deployed item
This API deploys an item used by CI
This API deploys an item
This API updates the configure deployment of an item
This API updates the configure deployment of an item and deploy
This API appends an item by branch
This API appends an item by tag
This API triggers maintenance operation on a deployed item.

description: This service provides the ability to create a heterogeneous catalog capable to automatically adapt and onboard all kind of different type of components is the way to go.
